title: Disney Treasures - Dr. Syn: The Scarecrow of Romney Marsh
description:
A personal favorite of mine, went out and bought it the day it was released. The job Disney did restoring this film is top notch, with great picture and sound. Each episode has an introduction by Walt Disney and there is also a short documentary about the film which chronicles its history. Please seed when your done downloading so others can enjoy a true Disney classic.

Originally airing in three parts on "Walt Disney's Wonderful World of Color," this thrilling adventure stars Patrick McGoohan as Dr. Syn, a kindly country vicar in 18th-century England. Only a few know that Syn is also the masked Scarecrow, notorious leader of a band of smugglers, who defends the villagers from unjust taxes and oppression by King George III's men. George Cole, Michael Hordern, Sean Scully also star. Includes all three episodes. 129 min./98 min. AKA: "Dr. Syn, Alias the Scarecrow," "The Scarecrow of Romney Marsh." Soundtracks: English Dolby Digital 5.1, Dolby Digital mono. NTSC
